com.analog.lyric.dimple.options

Class BPOptions

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.analog.lyric.options.OptionKeyDeclarer

  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JunctionTreeOptions, MinSumOptions, ParticleBPOptions, SumProductOptions

    public class BPOptions
extends SolverOptions
    Common options for belief-propagation based solvers.

    Since:
    0.07

    • Field Detail

      • damping

        public static final DoubleOptionKey damping
        Global damping factor

        This option may be set on entire graph or on individual discrete variables or factors.

        Must be a value in the range [0.0, 1.0].

        Since:
        0.07

      • iterations

        public static final IntegerOptionKey iterations
        Specifies the number of iterations to perform when solving.

        This should only be set to a value greater than one when the factor graph is not singly connected (a graph is singly connected if there is only one unique path between any two nodes in the graph).

      • nodeSpecificDamping

        public static final DoubleListOptionKey nodeSpecificDamping
        Node specific damping values.

        This option may be set on individual discrete variables or factors. It must either be an empty list to indicate damping is turned off or to a list of damping values of the same length as the number of siblings.

        Option is looked up on message creation and when initialize is called.

        Since:
        0.07

      • maxMessageSize

        public static final IntegerOptionKey maxMessageSize
        Maximum size of discrete belief messages.

        This option may be set on entire graph or on individual discrete factors.

        If less than the full domain size of the message, then messages will be truncated to this number of dimensions with the lowest weight dimensions omitted.

        Must be a positive number.

        Since:
        0.07

      • updateApproach

        public static final EnumOptionKey<UpdateApproach> updateApproach
        Update approach.

        This option may be set on entire graph or on individual discrete factors.

        Since:
        0.07

      • automaticExecutionTimeScalingFactor

        public static final DoubleOptionKey automaticExecutionTimeScalingFactor
        Execution time scaling factor for weighing execution time and memory allocation costs.

        This option may be set on entire graph or on individual discrete factors.

        Must be a positive number.

        Since:
        0.07

      • automaticMemoryAllocationScalingFactor

        public static final DoubleOptionKey automaticMemoryAllocationScalingFactor
        Memory allocation scaling factor for weighing execution time and memory allocation costs.

        This option may be set on entire graph or on individual discrete factors.

        Must be a positive number.

        Since:
        0.07

      • optimizedUpdateSparseThreshold

        public static final DoubleOptionKey optimizedUpdateSparseThreshold
        Density, below which the optimized update algorithm will use a sparse representation for its auxiliary factor tables.

        This option may be set on entire graph or on individual discrete factors.

        Must be a value in the range [0.0, 1.0].

        Since:
        0.07

      • BPOptions

        public BPOptions()
